ygData.subject: Re: Prenatal Wizard re: Askur
ygData.msgSnippet: I like it!  And say hey sometime to me and I will gladly group with you.  I play Veeshan as well as a DE Wiz and will shortly hit level 15 and hopefully 16
ygData.messageBody:
I like it! And say "hey" sometime to me and I will gladly group with
you. I play Veeshan as well as a DE Wiz and will shortly hit level 15 and
hopefully 16 this weekend...can you say "new spells" - finally! My name as
my wizard is Alaia. I am currently working Oasis and pulling my exp. up
there quite nicely. That is if the Sand Giants don't stomp me first! So,
give a /tell sometime if you are on with your wiz and want a group to hang
with, I will gladly drag you in and get you some good exp. too.




At 01:24 AM 6/5/99 +0200, you wrote:
>From: "zinken" <zinken@...>
>
>Hi Robert and evryone else
>
>
>I can understand your frustration and i have been there to, want to know
>what i did ?. I started an Dwarf Paladin couse i want to be able to have
>magic, i playd him almost 20 hours and got him up to lv 10.
>I think that Paladin�s are a great class but when i came back to my Wizard
>again and evrything was fun again, i got him leveld u from 16 to 19 and
>now that feeling comes over me again.
>I have so hard finding any XP by myself or find a group to get XP in, i
>have been to unrest but i dont like that place. Either your in a strong
>group there and you don get much in XP or you are in a group around the
>same level so you have to zone sometimes with the result it takes ages to
>regroup and get back to the killing of undeads.
>I have been Lv 19 so long now i cant take much more of this so i will play
>my Paladin for a while i think and wait for the feeling for my litle gnome
>wizard to get back, it always does so i�m not worried about that.
>
>Hmmmm that was not what i intended to write in the first place :-)
>
>Wizards are fun to play!!!!
>
>Askur Lv 19,5 Wizard of Veeshan
>Askan Lv 10 Paladin of Veeshan
>
>-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
>Fr�n: Robert Spelman <madoc_ab_owain@...>
>Till: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Datum: den 5 juni 1999 00:38
>�mne: Re: [eq_wizards] Prenatal Wizard
>
>
> >From: Robert Spelman <madoc_ab_owain@...>
> >
> >Re: Message: 3
> > Date: Thu, 3 Jun 1999 14:40:00 +0100
> > From: David.Lynam@...
> > Subject: PreNatal Wizard
> >
> >Well, I'm finally going to break down and seriously play a spellcasting
> >class. Of course due to the raw power of the class, as well as the
> >versatility of teleportation, Wizards are my first choice. I realize that
> >people have most likely time and again requested spell lists, but here I
> am,
> >brand spanking new to the list. I was wondering if perhaps some nice soul
> >out there might be able to send me a complete list. I've checked EQLizer,
> >EQVault, and EQstratics and none of them have every spell, thanks in
> advance
> >everyone.
> >
> >----------------------------
> >
> >I'm a 14th level wizard on E'Ci. David, if I may be honest here, I would
> >like to suggest that if you want to have fun playing a spellcaster, pick
> >about anything other than Wizard. Enchanters get pets and can make magical
> >items. If I were to start over and pick a pure mage class, that would be
> the
> >one I'd go with.
> >
> >*ducks flameage*
> >
> ><rant mode>
> >
> >Let me explain - Verant hasn't implemented specialization skills or the
> >alternate planes, we have almost nothing for armor or hitpoints, our melee
> >skills are pathetic and our powers don't become greater than other classes
> >until 40-somethingth level. Plus, the single greatest way of leveling up -
> >killing har red mobs - is unavailable to us, because our spells are often
> >resisted completely by these creatures. So, instead of grouping with
> >powerful warriors to beat up on mobs that will actually give EVERYONE in
> the
> >group decent experience, we're relegated to trying to solo weak blues or
> >fight white and yellow creatures in a group for pitiful experience because
> >WE CAN'T TOUCH HARD MOBS LIKE EVERY OTHER CLASS CAN!
> >
> >I've watched every group I've run with pass me up in level. I've watched
> >characters started while I was at level 12 PASS ME at level 13. It's not as
> >though I never play, it's just that I CANNOT GAIN MORE THAN HALF A BUBBLE
> >EXP PER HOUR, on average. That's powergaming, soloing in the Karanas vs.
> >blue beetles and the occasional white/yellow.
> >
> >Needless to say, I'm very frustrated in playing this class right now. The
> >only reason I remain a Wizard is stubbornness. Everyone says it gets better
> >at higher levels, but the fact of the matter is that we'll always be a
> >second-rate class unless Verant fixes specialization, plane travel and
> >spell-resistances of higher-level mobs.
> >
> ></rant mode>
> >
> >Vash, 14th Level Wizardess, Felwithe/North Karana, E'ci
> >
> >
